QuestData.Title: The Fastest Way to His Heart
QuestData.Description: Oh, girl! You're never going to guess who's out on the oil platform to the north.$B$B<Izzy shakes her head sadly at you.>$B$BChip's out there, and he's working for the Trade Prince. That cold-hearted snake dropped you like a bad habit and now he's working for the other team. I even heard he's going out with that tramp, Candy Cane!$B$BI don't know about you, but if he was my ex, I'd rip his still-beating heart out of his chest.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Carve the Still-Beating Heart from his chest!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rip the Still-Beating Heart from out of Chip Endale's chest.
QuestData.CompletionText: What did you decide? Death or forgiveness?
QuestData.RewardText: He got just what he deserved. There, there, don't cry. You'll find someone else that'll treat you right.$B$BHere, let me take that... we wouldn't want people to think that you're crazy.
